entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Gore Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:49 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain mixed with freezing rain beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
